definition: a narrow bed on which a patient lies during psychiatric or psychoanalytic treatment, to formulate in a particular style or language
details:
noun
- a narrow bed on which a patient lies during psychiatric or psychoanalytic treatment
- a flat coat of paint or varnish used by artists as a primer
- an upholstered seat for more than one person
= synonyms: lounge, sofa
verb
- to formulate in a particular style or language
= synonyms: cast
